text: Fairfield Sun Times is a weekly newspaper serving Fairfield, Montana and surrounding towns Choteau, Augusta, Vaughn, Power, Simms, Ft. Shaw and Sun River. Its circulation area encompasses parts of Teton County, Cascade County and Lewis and Clark County.https://www.fairfieldsuntimes.com/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:Newspapers published in Montana Category:Publications established in 1912 Category:1912 establishments in Montana
title: Fairfield Sun Times
